Posts.Title: 1st haircut after vhemo

Posts.Content: Thank you R. That's reassuring and helpful. I finished chemo in may this year and my hair is soft, fuzzy and stood up on top at present and a little longer round the sides and back. We go on the only holiday that we did not cancel in October and I am hoping my hair will be long enough to go without my wig albeit with a crew cut! I really did not want to have it shaved. Now I shall leave it to find its own way and appreciate it at each stage!

Posts.Content: I just would like to know at what point anyone had their 1st haircut post baldness?! I'm reluctant to lose anymore hai, but if that's what it takes....??
